SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

API_KEY.description: An API key used to communiate with the service.

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Go to https://console.developers.google.com/ to generate one

GOOGLE_DOMAIN.description: The Google Apps domain you wish to restrict login to

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: Github API token for a user that has access to the repository. https://github.com/settings/tokens

GITHUB_API_ROOT.description: The base URL for the API. Defaults to https://api.github.com

SENTRY_DSN.description: A DSN value from Sentry (Configuration/Client Keys for the project)

SSH_PRIVATE_KEY.description: A private key to use when cloning repositories
